channel.title: [SRL] Scarf4ce Power Chopper [SRL]
channel.description:
Hey this is my first script I've ever made so I'd like feedback on it as well as progress reports :P. This script will will chop any tree anywhere and then drop the logs and repeat for the specified amount of loads.
[B]What this script has:[/B] - Anti Ban - Anti Randoms - Muti Players - Yohojo's Ent Finder - Axe Head Finder - Forms
[B]Known Bugs:[/B] - Tell me :P
[B]Thanks to:[/B] - Yohojo for letting me use his Ent finder, - JAD for his tutorials and helping me with failsafes. - Mad Cow and Starblaster100 for their form tutorials
Post progress reports please =]
[size=15pt]Uses Scar Divi 3.06 and SRL 3.81[/size]
[code] { ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ // \\ || Scarf4ce's Power Willow Chopper || ||~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~|| ||1) Use Runescape on Low Detail || ||2) Declare your players. || ||3) Drag the cross hairs onto the RS screen || ||4) Press the Run Script button || ||5) Select your Tree type and if necessary, || || change the Tree Color || ||6) Keep your axe in the first inv slot || ||7) Hit the Start button and watch your lvl || || climb :P. || ||8) Post your progress report =]. || ||~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~|| || Thanks to || ||~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~|| || - Yohojo for letting me use his Ent || || finding procedure || || - JAD for helping me with failsafes || || and for his tutorials that helped me || || with my anti-ban and anti randoms || || - SRL community with helping me fix || || errors || || - Mad Cow and Starblaster100 for their || \\ awesome form-making tutorials // ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ }[/code]

item.title: [SRL] Scarf4ce Power Chopper [SRL]
item.dc:creator: @Nashi Nashi
item.description:
@Nashi wrote:

I think “ComboBox1.Onclick:=@ChangeColor;” Should be “ComboBox1.OnChange:=@ChangeColor;”
If you want it to change when you change it.

And in the anti ban theres a case of Random(5) but theres 10 options

Other then that it seems good, I never got a chance to run it though

Read full topic

item.title: [SRL] Scarf4ce Power Chopper [SRL]
item.dc:creator: @Scarf4ce Scarf4ce
item.description:
@Scarf4ce wrote:

Hey this is my first script I’ve ever made so I’d like feedback on it as well as progress reports :P. This script will will chop any tree anywhere and then drop the logs and repeat for the specified amount of loads.

What this script has:

  • Anti Ban
  • Anti Randoms
  • Muti Players
  • Yohojo’s Ent Finder
  • Axe Head Finder
  • Forms

Known Bugs:

  • Tell me

Thanks to:

  • Yohojo for letting me use his Ent finder,
  • JAD for his tutorials and helping me with failsafes.
  • Mad Cow and Starblaster100 for their form tutorials

Post progress reports please =]

[size=15pt]Uses Scar Divi 3.06 and SRL 3.81[/size]

[code]
{

//                                           \\
||     Scarf4ce's Power Willow Chopper       ||
||~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~||
||1) Use Runescape on Low Detail             ||
||2) Declare your players.                   ||
||3) Drag the cross hairs onto the RS screen ||
||4) Press the Run Script button             ||
||5) Select your Tree type and if necessary, ||
||   change the Tree Color                   ||
||6) Keep your axe in the first inv slot     ||
||7) Hit the Start button and watch your lvl ||
||   climb :P.                               ||
||8) Post your progress report =].           ||
